title: Why Calendula is A Great Herb For Skin Care
author: Mindful Momma
description: Learn the many ways calendula is beneficial in skin care - for everything from natural first aid, to diaper rash and eczema to anti-aging.
cleaned_text: Learn the many ways calendula is beneficial in skin care. Let's have an ingredient lesson today, shall we? We hear so much about [ingredients to avoid in skin care](https://mindfulmomma.com/2015/10/how-to-buy-better-beauty-and-personal-care-products.html), I thought it would be helpful to take a look at some of the good ones! Calendula is an herb with beautiful orange/yellow flowers, long known for its healing and soothing properties. The infographic below touches on some of the many ways calendula is beneficial in skin care - for everything from natural first aid, to diaper rash and eczema to anti-aging.
